attributes.additional_details: THIS IS A PETITION TO ASK THE GOVERNMENT TO RE-THINK THE CUTS THEY ARE GOING TO MAKE TO THE POLICE FORCE AFTER THE RIOTS WE HAVE HAD IN THE U.K. THIS WEEK I THINK WE NEED THE EXTRA POLICE NOT A 20% CUT IN THEM AS WAS SEEN IN LONDON ONCE THE EXTRA POLICE WERE ON THE STREETS THE RIOTS STOPPED ! SO SIGN THIS PETITION AS WE WANT DAVID CAMERON TO SCRAP THE POLICE CUTS AND MAKE ENGLAND'S STREETS A SAFER PLACE !!!!
